search-events-description: View all contents on Linked Events.
event-filter-content-text: Filter by content name, description or place:
add-events: Add an event to a serial event
confirm-update-draft-draft: Confirm saving the changes to drafts
confirm-cancel-extra: Notice! This function will cancel the content.
super-event-of-series: This is the top event of a series.
sub-event-of-series: This content is part of a series:
sub-event-of-umbrella: This content has an umbrella event:
table-event-moderation: Moderation table for publishing and deleting contents
event-page-error: Content not found or you don't have the permission to view it.
event-presented-in-languages: Select the language the content will be published in
event-presented-in-languages2: We recommend writing in multiple languages.
event-provider-input: Event organizer or contact details. Notice! The information is public.
hobby-provider-input: Hobby organizer or contact details. Notice! The information is public.
course-provider-input: Education organizer or contact details. Notice! The information is public.
events-management-description: Browse and edit the contents published by your organization.
events-management-description-regular-us: Browse and edit your drafts and browse your published events. Published events can't be edited.
events-management-description-public-use: Browse and edit events published by you.
events-management-description-super-user: Browse and edit all published events.
filter-event-type: Browse contents, of which the type is:
choose-image: Upload or choose an image for this event
use-external-image-url: or use image in external URL:
organization-missing-message: You don't have any permission to manage events yet.
organization-missing-message1: If you have already been granted access, your login may have expired. Try refreshing the page (F5) or logging in again.
organization-missing-message-contact2: to gain permissions to edit events in your unit.
use-existing-image: Image bank is empty. Upload an image or choose a standard image.
search-images: Search by image name, alt-text, publisher or photographer's name
search-image-result: {count} images in the image bank on {page} pages
event-add-recurring-limit: The maximum amount of recurring times is {count}, you are adding {subEventcount} times.
event-add-recurring-error: Reduce the number of recurring times, the maximum amount of recurring times is {count} and you are adding {subEventcount} times.
event-series-time: Event {count}: Please fill in both the start and end time
event-add-price-limit: Price information can be up to {count} pieces.
event-video-add-limit: There can be only up to {count} videos.
event-categories-header-type: Select at least one from each category
event-umbrella-header: Is your event related to other events?
event-has-umbrella-select-tip: An umbrella event has to be created before events can be added under it.
event-languages-header2: Languages, in which the event will be hosted
event-languages-header: Select the languages used in the event
hobby-languages-header2: Languages the hobby will be hosted in
hobby-languages-header: Select the languages used in the hobby
course-languages-header2: Languages the education will be hosted in
course-languages-header: Select the languages used in the education
validation-isUrl: Enter the URL in correct format (http://...)
validation-isTime: Enter the time in the correct format hh.mm
validation-isDate: Enter the date in the correct format dd.mm.yyyy hh.mm
validation-isInt: The input has to be a number
validation-atLeastOne: At least one item must be selected
validation-atLeastOneMainCategory: At least one item must be selected
validation-atLeastOneSecondaryCategory: At least one item must be selected
validation-afterStartTime: The end time must be later than start time
validation-afterStartTimeAndInFuture: The end time must be in the future and later than start time
validation-afterEnrolmentStartTime: The end time must be later than start time
validation-inTheFuture: The end time must be in the future
validation-stringLimitReached: This field can have no more than {limit} characters
validation-requiredInContentLanguages: This field is mandatory for all chosen languages
validation-isMoreThanOne: The minimum repetition interval is 1 week
validation-isMoreThanTwo: Serial event must contain at least 2 events.
validation-daysWithinInterval: One or more of the weekdays does not occur in the selected date range
validation-requiredImage: Image is required for content publishing
validation-isLessThanMaxAge: Minimum age must be less than maximum age
validation-isMoreThanMinAge: Maximum age must be more than minimum age
validation-isLessThanMaximumCapacity: Minimum attendee must be less than maximum attendees
validation-isMoreThanMinimumCapacity: Maximum attendees must be more than minimum attendees
validation-isMoreThanSix: The alt text in the image must be at least 6 characters long
validation-error: There are errors on the form. Please check the form.
no-validation-errors: The form does not have any errors!
confirm-type-switch: Confirm the change of content type
type-switch: Tapahtuma: Notice! When changing the content type, following information will be cleared: category and keywords.
event-target-groups-header: Select only if the event targets a specific target group
hobby-target-groups-header: Select only when the hobby targets a specific target group
course-target-groups-header: Select only when the education targets a specific target group
editor-publish-draft-warning: N.B. The event will be published on the Internet. The original submitter can no longer edit the event.
editor-publish-draft-extra-warning: The following events will be published:
editor-update-warning: The changes will affect all the events in the series. Any previous changes to the selected events will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
editor-update-extra-warning: The changes will affect the following events:
editor-update-draft-warning: The changes will affect all the events in the series. Any previous changes to the selected events will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
editor-update-draft-draft-warning: The changes will affect all the contents in the series. Any previous changes to the selected contents will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
editor-update-draft-extra-warning: The changes will affect the following events:
editor-update-draft-draft-extra-warning: The changes will affect the following contents:
editor-cancel-warning: Instead of cancelling you may also organize the event, hobby or education online on the Internet. In that case, edit the event and pick the location Internet in the location menu. You may also postpone the event, hobby or education or delete the mistakenly entered contents.
editor-cancel-extra-warning: The following events will be cancelled:
editor-postpone-warning: Notice! This function will postpone the event, hobby or education. You can later enter a new date.
editor-postpone-draft-warning: Notice! This function will postpone the event, hobby or education. You can later enter a new date.
editor-postpone-extra-warning: The following events will be postponed:
editor-delete-warning: Notice! This function will delete the contents permanently. You may also cancel or postpone the event, hobby or education if needed.
editor-delete-extra-warning: The following contents will be deleted:
editor-delete-draft-warning: WARNING. The event will be permanently deleted. You can also contact the original submitter about editing their post.
editor-delete-draft-extra-warning: The following events will be deleted:
editor-sentinel-alert: You can view the form, but you don't have the permission to publish or edit events. You are not logged in or your login has expired.
editor-authorization-required: You must be logged in to create or edit events.
editor-tip-umbrella-sub-event: If you wish to add this event under an umbrella event, you may do so from the associated
editor-tip-eventtype-disable: Delete the added times, if you would like to change the event recurrence.
editor-tip-required: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
delete-from-filesystem: Delete image from the file system
moderation-page-published-description: Drafts published under an existing umbrella event will not be shown here.
table-events-checkbox-invalid: Correct the validation errors of the content {name} before you can choose
table-events-checkbox-error: Correct the validation errors of the content {name} before you can choose
table-events-checkbox-all: Choose all the contents with no validation errors for deletion or publication
draft-publish-subevent: A subevent of a series cannot be published.
event-validation-errors: Content data contains errors, correct the erraneous data before publishing..
subevent-validation-errors: Sub-contents contain errors. Fix errors before publication.
user-no-rights-edit: You have insufficient rights to edit this event.
user-no-rights-create: You have insufficient rights to create events.
not-enough-sub-events: Series needs to contain atleast 2 contents
subevent-invalid-postpone: The content of a series can't be postponed
uploaded-image-size-error: The image exceeds the allowed maximum size of 4 megabytes (MB).
event-uploaded-image-alt-decoration: The picture is decorative. Choose when the image does not convey any relevant information about the event.
hobby-uploaded-image-alt-decoration: The picture is decorative. Choose when the image does not convey any relevant information about the hobby.
course-uploaded-image-alt-decoration: The picture is decorative. Choose when the image does not convey any relevant information about the education.
thumbnail-picture-delete: Delete this image from the system
alt-text: Your own description of the image contents for screen readers
event-image-modal-license-restricted: Image may be used only for this event.
hobby-image-modal-license-restricted: Image may be used only for this hobby.
course-image-modal-license-restricted: Image may be used only for this education.
image-modal-image-license-permission: I have permission to use this image.
event-image-modal-image-license-explanat: Image may be used only for this event: image use is limited to this event.
hobby-image-modal-image-license-explanat: Image may be used only for this hobby = Image use is limited to this hobby.
course-image-modal-image-license-explana: Image may be used only for this education: Image use is limited to this education.
image-modal-image-license-explanation-cc: CC BY 4.0: image is free to share and use, as long as a link to license is provided (additional information about CC BY 4.0. Opens in a new browser tab).
image-modal-view-terms-paragraph-text: Prior to uploading a new image, get to know the image terms and recommendations (opens in a new browser tab).
error-message-has-been-sent: The error message has been sent. Thank you for reporting!
invalid-date-time-format: Enter the date and time in the correct format.
user-events-toggle: Only display the contents created by me.
navbar.brand: Linked Events logo, link to front page
navbar.active: Change language, Vaihda kieli, Ändra språk
uploaded-image-size-tip: Accepted file formats include jpeg, gif and png. Maximum image size is 4 MB.
uploaded-image-size-tip2: We recommend the aspect ratio 1920 x 1080 px.
uploaded-image-event-tip: The uploaded image will be added to your image bank.
reportmodal-tooltip: If there is an error in event management or the operation of the input form, fill in the description of the error situation and we will get the information and can investigate.
table-pagination-shortcut-link: Back to top of the table
close-image-edit-modal: Close the Add / Edit Image dialog
event-name-descriptions: Write a clear title and clear descriptions
login-warning2: to be able to submit or edit contents.
event-is-virtualandhaslocation: This event is both virtual and physical
homepage-introduction-one: Welcome to add your events, hobbies or educations to the Linked Events of Southwest Finland!
homepage-introduction-two: Enter data for use in multiple locations at once. Linked Events is an open data database. The information you enter in the database is available for various applications, such as in the municipal event calendars or on the hobbyists' own pages.
homepage-introduction-three: Read more about Linked Events on the 'Learn More'-tab.
page-not-found-lead: Unfortunately, the page you're looking for was not found.
select-menu-choose: Use Up and Down to choose options
select-menu-disabled: , press Enter to select the currently focused option
select-menu-exit: , press Escape to exit the menu
select-menu-tab: , press Tab to select the option and exit the menu
select-menu-tab-keyword: , press Tab to select the option and exit the menu. An ontology opens below the menu, where you can select exact keywords based on the selected option.
select-input-open: , press Down to open the menu,
select-input-isMulti: press left to focus selected values
select-value-isMulti: Use left and right to toggle between focused values, press Backspace to remove the currently focused value
select-clear: All selected options have been cleared.
select-option-disabled: option {label} is disabled. Select another option.
fi-language-remove: Notice! All content for language 'finnish' will be cleared.
sv-language-remove: Notice! All content for language 'swedish' will be cleared.
en-language-remove: Notice! All content for language 'english' will be cleared.
mailto-body: Reporting an error that occurred in Linked events. Description of the error below:%0A-%0A-%0A-%0A-%0A%0AInstructions on reporting an error:%0A- What was being done before the error occurred%0A- What time did the error occur%0A- What functionality caused the error%0A- What browser and device was used
admin-org-errors: Organizations informations contain errors, please fix them before saving.
admin-error-tooShort: Name should have minimum of 4 characters
admin-error-tooLong: Name can have no more than 40 characters
admin-error-shortId: Origin ID should have minimum of X characters
admin-error-longId: Origin ID can have no more than X characters
admin-error-noDataSource: Data source has not been selected
admin-error-incorrectDate: Founding date is in incorrect format
